alert.note: Alert for Cody Foothills; North Big Horn Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 16 at 1:50PM MST until November 17 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM WEDNESDAY TO 9 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches near Cody, Meeteetse, Powell, and Clark. Accumulations 1 to 3 inches expected elsewhere. North wind gusting 30 to 40 mph will lead to blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Cody Foothills and North Big Horn Basin. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 9 AM MST Thursday. The heaviest snow is likely to fall between 8 PM Wednesday and 2 AM Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel on roadways, especially US Highway 16 between Cody and Greybull and along Wyoming Highway 120, will be impacted by winter driving conditions and lowered visibility at times Wednesday night into Thursday morning. Blowing and drifting snow will occur.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Cody Foothills; North Big Horn Basin
